title: Star wars (Captioned)
brief_description: Princess Leia is captured by the evil imperial forces in their efforts to take over the galactic Empire. Venturesome Luke Skywalker and dashing space captain Han Solo team together with the lovable Droids C-3PO and R2D2 to restore justice to the universe.
